mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community ( id, start_date, end_date, loc_category, notice, total, deadline ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{locCategory}, #{notice}, #{total}, #{deadline} );
INSERT INTO owner ( own, member_id, content_id ) VALUES ( #{own}, #{memberId}, #{contentId} )
mapper.select: SELECT c1.id, c2.title, o.member_id writer_id, m.login_id writer, c1.deadline, c1.view_point, c1.total, c1.status, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM owner WHERE content_id = id ) participants_count FROM community c1, owner o, member m, content c2 WHERE c1.id = o.content_id AND o.member_id = m.id AND o.own = 'writer' AND c2.id = c1.id LIMIT 10;
SELECT c1.*, c2.title, c2.created_at, c2.modified_at FROM community c1, content c2 WHERE c1.id = c2.id AND c1.id = #{id};
SELECT o.member_id, o.own, m.login_id, m.profile FROM member m, owner o WHERE m.id = o.member_id AND o.content_id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE community SET start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, loc_category = #{locCategory}, notice = #{notice}, total = #{total}, deadline = #{deadline} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM owner WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND content_id = #{contentId}
